    RNA Translation Lab

    Welcome to the RNA Translation Lab at the Genome Institute of Singapore (A*STAR).

    We study RNA translation biology in human health and disease using data-driven approaches, with a focus on uncovering hidden proteins in cancer.

    ðŸ’¡ We are part of global efforts to annotate translation events and develop community resources.
